resources.string: TSR Heart Care and Diagnostics Providing the COVID 19 Services in the Bengaluru city. We have different packages with slot booking systems. Also we provide Home quarantine services with 24/7 teleconference support. 24/7 medical assistance available to monitor symptoms on demand. We also provide home quarantine kits for the users and can buy through online by making online payment.

5 Days Package :- 
Includes :-
 ● Room rent
 ● 3 meals
 ● Doctor and nurse visit once a day 

 7 days Package :-
 
Includes :-
 ● Room rent
 ● 3 meals
 ● Doctor and nurse visit once a day

 10 Days Package :-
 
Includes :-
 ● Room rent
 ● 3 meals
 ● Doctor and nurse visit once a day
 
 Charges for video Consultantion with TSR Covid / Specialist

TSR HEART CARE AND DIAGNOSTICS, BANGALORE 
 INTRODUCES 


Home Quarantine Package for COVID 19 Patients.
 This is designed exclusively for asymptomatic and mildly symptomatic patients INR 6000 for 14 days. 

 ● Self-monitoring of temperature and other symptoms.
 ● Tele-assistance on home isolation protocols.
 ● Video consultation with doctor on alternate days.
 ● total 7 consultations .
 ● one consultations with dietician.
 ● Consultation with a clinical psychologist.
 ● Consultation with a dietician.
 ● Consultation with tele-rehabilitation specialist.
 ● 24/7 medical assistance to monitor symptoms .
 ● 24/7 Covid 19 helpline available.

● Home sample collection 
 ● Additional tele- consultation 
 ● Additional counselling sessions 
 ● Pulse oximeter|Digital thermometer|N95 masks 
 ● Examination Gloves|Vitamin C|Paracetamol|Sinarest
